tender.title: Construction of ICBP road from T.K. Road near Murmela High School to Budha Mandir M.B. Road via Murmela, Belguri and Khusurabari village under CMs Goodwill Mission Project for the financial year 2023-24 of District Udalguri. (TN_26_139)
